TopicTitle: Headphones not working on my Windows 8.1 PC?Please help?

Articles.Content: Why are my headphones not working on a Windows 8.1 PC but they work on my tablets and smartphones can some one please give me easy to read and follow instructions.My cord on my headphones is fine so it is not the cord.Any help would be appreciated.
Is the volume set correctly? Is it muted? Do the speakers work? Do other headphones work in the same jack? Need more details here.
I'm not sure how Windows 8.1 works (I'm fine with 7), but I had similar problems. Try "test speakers". That forces them to produce sound. It's weird, but it works.
Find some sort of audio output device setting in the preferences and change it to the headphones.
right click your volume button. you will see something about playback devises. click that, and choose the headphones as default.
